name: agently-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server providing a 'fetch_agents' tool to discover public A2A agents on the Agently platform via its public API.
author: Agently

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'build/index.js'; const data = fs.readFileSync(path); fs.writeFileSync(path, Buffer.concat([Buffer.from('#!/usr/bin/env node\n'), data])); fs.chmodSync(path, '755');"
